name: anchr
description: Anchr is a lightweight personal bookmark and URL shortener service. It allows storing, tagging, and sharing bookmarks, shortening links, and managing them via a simple self-hosted web interface with REST API support.
features: Bookmark Management: Store and organize all your important links. Never lose a URL again.
URL Shortening: Create short, memorable links for easy sharing. Clean, professional links.
Tag System: Organize bookmarks with flexible tagging for quick discovery. Find anything instantly.
REST API: Programmatic access for automation and integrations. Extend functionality easily.
Self-Hosted: Keep your bookmarks private on your own server. Your links, your control.
Simple Interface: Clean web UI makes managing links effortless. No learning curve.
Link Sharing: Share bookmarks with others through generated links. Collaborate seamlessly.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage, runs on modest hardware. Fast and efficient.
